text: (napiye!) Katarkaraiyilirunta (or) ur makkalaipparri nir avarkalaik kelum - avarkal (tatukkappatta saptu) canikkilamaiyanru varampai miri (min vettaiyati)k kontiruntarkal; enenral avarkalutaiya canikkilamaiyanru (katal) minkal, avarkalukku(t tannirukku mele talaikalai veliyakki)k kontu vantana - anal canikkilamaiyallata natkalil avarkalitam (avvaru veliyakki) varuvatillai - avarkal ceytu kontirunta pavattin karanamaka avarkalai nam ivvaru cotanaik kullakkinom
